title: Use uploaded images as full-page backgrounds on Landing and Gratitude pages

requirements.text: Update the Landing page so the uploaded image at `/assets/3a6059bf59d32f6f27e0496b5424853a.jpg` is used as a full-page background image behind all existing content (not just rendered as an inline image). The background must cover the viewport (CSS cover/center), remain fixed behind the UI layer, and must not break the Yes/No button layout or the evasive behavior of the No button.

quotes: No I need the uploaded images as background images

acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing page, the visible page background uses `/assets/3a6059bf59d32f6f27e0496b5424853a.jpg` and fills the viewport using cover/center styling.
All existing Landing page foreground UI remains visible above the background (proper stacking via z-index / positioning).
The No button remains fully interactive and continues to evade on hover/mousedown/touchstart without being blocked by the background layer.
The Yes button still works and still navigates to the Gratitude page.

requirements.text: Update the Gratitude page so the uploaded image at `/assets/2fe29e3f61a6e53093c503c181238cdc.jpg` is used as a full-page background image behind all existing content. The background must cover the viewport (CSS cover/center) and remain behind the page content without reducing readability or breaking layout.

quotes: No I need the uploaded images as background images

acceptanceCriteria: On the Gratitude page, the visible page background uses `/assets/2fe29e3f61a6e53093c503c181238cdc.jpg` and fills the viewport using cover/center styling.
All existing Gratitude page content renders above the background and remains readable (e.g., via existing styling or a subtle overlay if needed).
No changes break navigation flow (Landing â†’ Gratitude).

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only).
Do not change the backend (Motoko) behavior or require backend image serving; all images must be loaded as static frontend assets via `/assets/...`.
Keep the existing Yes/No interaction behavior and page navigation intact.
nonGoals: Adding new pages or new user flows.
Introducing new image assets beyond the already-uploaded background images.
Implementing authentication, persistence, or any backend functionality.
